entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Widespread memory leak propagation in visual trees #21809
  • App crashes when it has a button with FontImageSource in version 8.0.20 #21808
    .NET 8 SR4
  • XML Serializer does not work correctly in "net8.0-ios" release mode #21803
  • [Tests] UITests need a more discoverable way to connect the unit test to the page under test #21802
  • Webview events fire different on iOS and Android #21800
  • [Android] Infinite arrange loop from VerticalStackLayoutManager.ArrangeChildren #21798
  • `WinUI` unknown exception when running as `Project` instead of `MsixPackage` #21794
  • .net 8 ObservableCollection Add method issue #21791

Closed

  • Changing CarouselView Position has no effect until it is set >0 and back to 0 when loop is disabled #9749

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, control-entry, layout-scrollview
  • [iOS] Fix KeyboardScrolling for controls inside the NavBar #21806
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, area/keyboard
  • Reduce the number of calls to invalidate measure #21801
    area/layout 🔲, area/perf 🏎️
  • [XC] compile OnIdiom #21799
  • fix: Use AppContext.BaseDirectory instead of Environment.CurrentDirec… #21797
    community ✨
  • [Housekeeping] Fix weak UITest #21796
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Extend NativeAOT Templates tests to cover all supported platforms #21793
  • `LayoutHandler.Windows`: Store children to a local variable #21792
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨

Updated

  • Improve Clamp() performance #20051
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • fix issue in orientation of images #21458
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
  • More IndexOf() optimization #20083
    community ✨
  • Fix null reference exception in KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when UIWindow is null #21753
    community ✨
  • Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21423
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Fixed box view properties #21322
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Minor optimization for `MergedStyle.SetStyle` #21540
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • Add unit test for button images in layouts #21651
    area/testing, community ✨
  • Document NavigableElement #21507
    area/navigation 🧭
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix Ripple Effect in ImageButton #21638
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 SR5
  • [iOS] Fix crash closing Popup with WebView #21718
    t/bug, area/navigation 🧭, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, .NET 8 SR4
